meanings.sent1: She commutated her hairstyle for a new look.
meanings.sent2: The artist commutated the colors in the painting to create a different mood.
meanings.sent3: He commutated his route to work, ending up in a different neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The decision commutated the course of their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The magic wand commutated the pumpkin into a carriage.

meanings.sent1: They commutated their lunch items to try something new.
meanings.sent2: The players commutated jerseys before the big game.
meanings.sent3: The siblings commutated chores to help each other out.
meanings.sent4: The chef commutated the ingredients in the recipe for a unique twist.
meanings.sent5: The students commutated books to share different stories.

meanings.definition: To commute or travel back and forth
meanings.sent1: She commutated between the city and the suburbs for work.
meanings.sent2: The ferry commutated passengers across the river all day.
meanings.sent3: The bee commutated between flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel commutated between trees in search of nuts.
meanings.sent5: The train commutated commuters to and from the station.
